Text: hey what's up Horrido?.....I want to play this game but I have no idea how any of this works.....I just found this site today....and it kicks ass!!!.....but will you please explain the torrent/seeding process to me and what I need to do to make this work.....thanks
I just checked it again.  It works fine.  Follow the instructions in the .nfo file.  Make sure you are extracting ALL of the files, and use unpack per the instructions.
